title: 3D Minecraft Animator (Cinematic & Emotional Storytelling)
description:
About the Role: We are seeking an exceptional 3D Animator who specializes in creating cinematic, high-retention Minecraft animations for YouTube. You will be responsible for producing emotionally engaging content that keeps viewers watching from start to finish.

What Makes You Perfect for This Role:

- Expressive Character Animation - You can bring Minecraft characters to life like real actors, with fluid body language, subtle facial expressions, and eye movements that convey genuine emotions (sadness, fear, joy, excitement)

- Cinematic Lighting & Rendering - You're an expert at creating mood through professional lighting. Whether it's a beautiful sunset or a terrifying storm, your renders look cinematic and high-end (RTX/Premium Shaders quality)

- Visual Storytelling - You understand camera techniques: when to use wide shots for scale and close-ups for emotional impact

YouTube Retention Mastery - You know how to create powerful hooks in the first 3 seconds that make viewers stay until the end

Reference Videos (This is the quality we expect):





Required Technical Skills:

- Software: Advanced proficiency in Blender (preferred) or Mine-imator

- 3D Modeling: Experience with Blockbench for creating/modifying custom models and mobs

- Post-Production: Understanding of sync, pacing, and screen-shake effects 

- Portfolio: Must have a demo reel or published videos showcasing your Minecraft animation work (not gameplay captures)

Your Responsibilities:

- Animate 45-60 second YouTube Shorts OR 3-5 minute cinematic stories

- Build detailed environments with high-quality textures and atmospheric VFX

- Collaborate on creative "What If" story concepts and bring them to life visually

- Ensure every frame contributes to viewer retention and emotional engagement

HOW TO APPLY:

Please submit your application with the following:

- VOXY - Type this word at the very top of your application

- Portfolio Link - Share your BEST Minecraft animation work (YouTube, Vimeo, or portfolio website)

- Software Used - List your primary 3D animation software and skill level

- Animation Process - Briefly explain (3-5 sentences) HOW you make Minecraft characters look emotional and alive instead of stiff and robotic

- Availability - When can you start? How many hours per week can you commit?

IMPORTANT: Applications without "VOXY" at the top or without a portfolio link will not be considered.

title: Video Editor
description:
SHORT-FORM VIDEO EDITOR (REMOTE)



Who we are:



Luck Management is a fast-growing Creator Management Agency working with high-performing creators across Europe and the US. We operate with a large, structured Marketing & Sales team and manage daily content output at scale for multiple clients.



Who we’re looking for:



We’re hiring an experienced Short-Form Video Editor for a full-time, long-term position, starting ASAP.

Your main job: Cutting RAW creator content into engaging viral short clips for Instagram Reels/TikTok. Think walking videos, Broll, lifestyle content, POV Clips. Nothing overly complicated, but speed, structure and a strong feeling for watchtime optimization & hooks are essential.



If you’ve already edited for creators or personal brands on social media, even better.



What you’ll do:



- Cut RAW footage into high-performing short-form clips (primarily Instagram & TikTok)

- Follow clear style guides, briefings & reference videos

- Handle occasional smaller edits (subtitles, timing tweaks, minor effects)

- Communicate daily with our team



Workload:



- Approx. 6–8 hours per day 

- 6-7 Days a week (Producing in advance is possible)

- We work with a defined number of videos that need to be delivered daily

- Speed and clean output matter



Compensation:



€800 – €1,200/month depending on skill level and output + performance bonuses. The better your work, the more you earn.



Tools



We’ve mostly worked with CapCut/Edit so far. Other editing tools are fine too, as long as the output quality fits.



What we expect



- Experience in video editing is helpful

- Solid understanding of short-form content fundamentals, watchtime & hooks

- Experience with creator content / personal brands is a big plus

- Reliable, responsive and available daily

- Hungry mindset, wants to grow long-term with a team



Process



1.Message us on
 with your introduction, experience & references

3.Interview Call 

4. If all went successfull, we start the onboarding



What we offer



- Long-term collaboration with stable daily workload

- High Pay

- Creative environment 

- Clear structures, guides & regular feedback

- Working with a professional, international team

- 100% remote



Important



Please do not apply if you’re actively working on many other projects or can’t treat this as a priority. No timewasters.

if you think you are a great a fit for our company, please 
 via
, with a nice introduction about yourself and past work experience.

title: Salesforce & Growth Operations Marketing Specialist (Healthcare SaaS – Daily Execution Role)
description:

Salesforce ? Website ? Content ? Outreach ? Tracking ? Optimization & conversions

title: Agency Recruiter – Remote (U.S. Clients)
description:
Our company is a fast-growing U.S.-based recruiting firm specializing in agriculture and agribusiness roles across the United States. We are building a team of international full-cycle recruiters ready to take the U.S. Agriculture industry by storm!

This position is ideal for experienced recruiters who are competitive, driven, highly organized, excellent communicators, and eager to earn significant income based on performance. To join us you must be hungry, driven, competitive, and capable of producing consistent results.



Job Summary

Full-cycle recruiters will manage the entire recruiting process, including sourcing, screening, reference checks, and candidate submissions. 



Key Responsibilities

- Source candidates using any effective method, tool, platform, or strategy

- Conduct phone-based screening interviews and reference checks

- Prepare and submit high-quality candidate packets

- Maintain real-time accuracy in the ATS and Google Drive

- Follow up consistently with candidates and internal tea
mbers

- Own assigned roles from intake through placement

- Meet weekly, monthly, and quarterly performance metrics

- Communicate clearly and professionally at all times

- Develop and refine recruiting strategies for all assigned roles, clients, and regions.

- Shorten time-to-fill for all roles, and especially hard-to-source roles.



Required Qualifications

- 3+ years of recruiting experience (agency strongly preferred)

- Fluent, clear English with neutral or very mild accent

- Strong written and verbal communication skills

- High attention to detail and follow-through

- Highly tech-savvy and able to learn new software quickly (ATS, task boards, AI tools, CRMs, spreadsheets)

- Strong problem-solving ability and independence

- Competent at LinkedIn sourcing and talent research

- Able to learn about the Agriculture industry and our clients very quickly

- Proficient with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, Gmail)

- Driven, persistent, and money-motivated

- Track record of successfully filling hard to source roles

- Ability to work U.S. business hours



Work Schedule

- Required availability: 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM EST

- Recruiters maintain autonomy over their daily break periods, provided they remain available for candidate/team interactions and meet all performance expectations

- Must be willing to work evenings and weekends when necessary to meet deliverables, especially during onboarding and the probationary period.





Compensation

- Competitive performance-based compensation (base + commission)

- Base pay structured as a draw against commission

- Opportunities for bonuses and profit sharing

- This role offers substantial earning potential for high performers, with the opportunity to far exceed typical compensation levels in your region



(Specific compensation details will be discussed privately during the interview process.)



Contractor Rest Allowances

Rest as needed, as long as you are meeting performance requirements and milestones.



Growth Opportunities

- Leadership or management experience is preferred but not required. We are growing rapidly, and high performers may progress into Team Lead or Manager roles within 3–6 months, with the opportunity to build and manage their own recruiting teams and receive additional compensation tied to team performance.



Screening Process

- Our selection process is rigorous and designed to identify exceptional performers. Applicants should expect:

- Skills assessments 

- Structured interviews

- Reference checks

- Thorough evaluations



Only candidates who demonstrate strong English communication, problem-solving ability, high output potential, and a desire for rapid career growth will advance.



Contractors will be terminated if they do not consistently meet performance expectations and benchmarks.

title: Accountant
description:
Privately Held Investment & Wealth Management Firm



Our finance team plays a central role in the business, ensuring leadership has clear, accurate financial information to guide strategic decisions.



We’re looking for a detail-oriented accounting professional who takes pride in maintaining clean books, building structured processes, and delivering consistent, dependable work. This role owns core accounting operations and is responsible for maintaining accuracy and discipline across recurring monthly cycles.



You’ll work directly with leadership and operate with a high level of autonomy. Success in this role requires strong judgment, follow-through, and comfort managing both day-to-day accounting and critical monthly deliverables in a fast-moving but well-structured environment.



What You’ll Own

• Day-to-day accounting operations across multiple entities

• Timely and accurate month-end close processes

• Account reconciliations and financial reporting

• Payroll processing (Gusto)

• Commission calculations tied to assets under management

• Maintaining organized and reliable financial data

• Preparing account summaries and supporting leadership reporting



What We’re Looking For

• 2+ years of experience as an Accountant or Senior Accountant

• Experience with QuickBooks and Gusto

• Strong Excel proficiency, including working within shared spreadsheets

• Experience in wealth management, financial planning, or financial services

• Prior experience working for a U.S.-based financial company

• Experience calculating commissions and performing reconciliations

• Strong understanding of accounting principles, financial reporting, and compliance (GAAP/IFRS, tax, audits)

• Experience preparing account summaries

• Familiarity with tax reduction strategies is a plus

• CPA preferred, but not required

• Willing and able to complete a background check requiring fingerprinting



How You Work

• Comfortable navigating shared file systems and cloud-based environments

• Confident working directly in shared documents without relying on local downloads

• Quick learner who adapts easily to new systems and processes

• Proactive communicator, comfortable engaging directly with leadership (Slack-based communication)

• Confident asking questions and seeking clarification

• Reliable, analytical, and highly detail-oriented

title: TikTok Manager
description:
Our world-class based model agency called Luck Management is based in Europe and looks for an (experienced) TikTok Manager.

The main part will be Tracking the TikTok Videos of our models, aswell as finding and creating new Content Ideas.



You will be part of an successful team that’s always striving for improvement to make everybody’s dream come true!



More information about the job:



In the starting phase you will get learned into our TikTok System and begin by Tracking the Videos of our models. This will show you the kind of Content we are currently producing + gives you a better understanding of what makes our videos go viral.



After you mastered the skill of tracking those videos, the next step would be finding new viral TikTok Trends/Sounds, that we can use for new TikTok Content.

As soon as you mastered this, we will teach you the way of creating viral content. The end goal is to have you as one of our TikTok Marketing Managers, that knows exactly how to make any client of us, go viral on TikTok :)



-> We teach you every step thats needed, but expect you to already have experience with TikTok and TikTok Content Creation. Before joining our agency you should already know how TikTok works and whats needed to go Viral on the platform.



Please only apply to this position if you have experience with TikTok Marketing!

We will ask for proof of your past work during the application process.



Requirements:



flawless english skills verbal + written



experience in the TikTok Marketing field



a second phone that you can use for TikTok work + good working PC/Laptop



perfect internet connection



open minded and adaptable



effective time-management skills



What you can expect:



very good salary with potential increase after some time (starting with 4-5$/hour).



possibility to level up in the company and increase your salary



strong support from our managers



healthy and supportive work environment and way more!



Schedule:



about 6-8 hours a day - 6-7days a week. We probably start with less hours and increase them by time



Contact:



Important!! -> The first message of your text should be „Viral TikTok“ and after that you should follow with your name, introduction etc., as we are getting lots of messages on Telegram and need to categorise it



So if you think you are a great a fit for our company, please 
 via Telegram with all the mentioned information above. We are looking forward to welcome you in our team with pleasure



Please make sure to really add proof of your past projects/experience, beside your introduction



If you take this application very seriously - it will change your life for the better - guaranteed - but you have to take it brutally seriously.



*Calls get blocked*



Good Luck! :)

Luck Management

title: Video Editor
description:
Video Creator / Video Editor – Velomix



Velomix is looking for a Video Creator / Editor to produce high-retention short-form videos for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts. This is an editing-first role for candidates passionate about storytelling through short-form content.





Key Responsibilities

-Plan, create, and edit short-form videos (hook-first)

-Add captions, subtitles, emojis, and on-screen text

-Repurpose content across TikTok / IG Reels / YouTube Shorts

-Maintain consistent brand style, pacing, and storytelling

-Edit UGC and creator content when needed

-Use CapCut or Adobe Premiere Pro



Skills Required

-Strong short-form video editing skills (CapCut / Premiere Pro)

-Basic design skills (Canva / Figma)

-Solid English copywriting (short, punchy, error-free)

-Google Sheets / Excel (for simple performance tracking)

-Organized, detail-oriented, able to manage multiple projects

-AI Video Creation



Preferred:

-Familiarity with TikTok analytics

-Experience editing UGC or creator content



Why Join Velomix?

-Editing-first role with clear priorities

-Fast-paced, supportive team

-Flexible working hours (PH-friendly)

-Continuous training and growth opportunities



How to Apply

Complete our Google Form: 



Apply Here





You will be asked to:

-Provide basic information

-Share your professional experience

-Submit your resume and video editing portfolio

-Answer three questions via video response



Note: Only applicants who submit a video response will be considered.

title: Real Estate Admin
description:
**Full-Time Real Estate Virtual Assistant – $380/month (Long-Term)**



**Work Hours (EST):**

* Mon–Thu: 2 PM – 8 PM

* Sat–Sun: 10 AM – 6 PM

* Friday: OFF



We are a growing real estate company looking for a **reliable, proactive, and trainable VA** to support agents and operations. This is **full-time long-term work** with consistent hours and growth opportunities.



**Key Tasks:**



* Prepare offers and transaction documents

* Collect showing feedback & maintain client reports

* Manage leads and respond to
s/texts

* Input and update property/building data

* Help improve admin systems & workflows



**Requirements:**



* Excellent written/spoken English

* Strong organization & attention to detail

* Reliable internet & computer

* Proactive, responsible, and willing to learn



**Salary:** $380/month 



**How to Apply:**



1. Submit your resume

2. Include a short paragraph about your VA/admin experience

3. Include an internet speed test screenshot

4. Record a **1–2 minute video** introducing yourself and telling us **why we should hire you**

5. Include the word **“Efficiency”** in your subject line



> Only applicants who submit all of the above will be considered.



This role is perfect for someone motivated, reliable, and looking for **long-term stable work**.

title: Real Estate VA - Inside Sales Agent
description:
Real Estate Virtual Assistant - Full-Time Inside Sales Agent

(Must have prior real estate experience)



Our St. Louis, MO, USA-based Real Estate Investments company, with over a decade in real estate investing, is seeking a dedicated and experienced real estate professional to join our growing team! If you enjoy negotiating deals, have a proven track record in real estate sales, and are looking for a remote opportunity where you can make an impact, please read the details and apply below by reading the how to apply instructions.



Job Description:

We are hiring for the position of Real Estate Inside Sales Agent. In this role, you will work remotely and be responsible for speaking with homeowners, gathering property information, negotiating offers, and securing contracts for our investment properties. Your main focus will be on acquiring distressed properties at favorable terms by getting property info, making offers, negotiating deals, and diligently following up to close sales. You will use your sales expertise and relationship-building skills to engage potential sellers, gather necessary information, and document interactions in our CRM system.



Responsibilities:

- Conduct outbound calls and send
s to manage real estate buying opportunities.

- Make offers to potential sellers and negotiate terms to get our offers accepted.

- Follow up on all leads and negotiations to ensure deal closure.

- Utilize effective sales strategies and scripts to handle objections and convey our company’s value proposition.

- Maintain detailed records of all interactions and negotiations in our CRM system.

- Collaborate with other tea
mbers to ensure seamless transaction processes.



Qualifications:

- High Energy and Enthusiastic Personality: You thrive in a fast-paced, engaging environment.

- 2+ Years of Real Estate Sales and Negotiations Experience: Proven background in closing deals.

- Exceptional English Communication Skills: Fluent in both written and verbal English.

- Fearless Negotiator: Eager to engage in challenging conversations, overcome objections, and secure agreements.

- Organized and Detail-Oriented: Excellent time management skills.

- Technologically Proficient: Experience using CRM systems and quick to learn new technologies.

- Problem Solver: Ability to navigate complex negotiations effectively.



System Requirements:

- Reliable high-speed laptop or desktop computer.

- DSL Internet connection with a minimum speed of 40+ Mbps.

- Noise-canceling headset.

- Must have a dedicated quiet home office setup



Performance Metrics:

- Talk to a certain number of sellers daily, weekly, and monthly.

- Achieve a target number of accepted offers each month.

- Consistently follow up to close deals within expected timeframes.



Career Growth & Training:

- Opportunities for advancement into leadership roles for high-performing individuals.

- Professional training provided to enhance your skills.



Company Culture:

- Dynamic and Collaborative: We value teamwork, integrity, and a drive for excellence.

- Supportive Environment: We believe in ongoing professional growth and celebrating achievements.

- High Ethical Standards: We conduct business with honesty and transparency.



What We’re Looking For:

- Self-motivated professionals with a positive attitude.

- Candidates with a dedicated home office setup.

- Ability to thrive in a remote role with excellent time management skills.

- Experience in real estate sales



What We’re Not Looking For:

- Candidates who cannot commit to our specified working hours: Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM CST.

- Minimal Communication Skills: If you struggle with fluent English communication, both written and verbal.

- Lack of Self-Motivation and Enthusiasm.

- Candidates unfamiliar with CRMs and resistant to learning new systems or scripts.

- Candidates with inconsistent internet and power supply or a disruptive workspace.

- Candidates who are easily flustered, shy, or fearful when making calls.

- Offline or Non-Voice Preference: This is a phone-based sales position.



Pay Rate:

Starting up to $6/hr, with performance bonuses. Pay is issued on the 1st and 15th of each month (CST).



Working Hours:

Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM CST. A 30-minute lunch break and two 15-minute breaks per shift.



How to Apply: (Submit Your Resume and Introduction)

-
 your updated resume and a brief personalized audio or video recording to: 

- Use the subject line "Real Estate Application - Inside Sales Agent"

- In your recording, introduce yourself and explain why you are a great fit for this role.

- Attach a recent internet speed test result and a photo of your home office setup to verify your system readiness.



= Important Note: Only complete applications that follow all the instructions will be considered. We look forward to reviewing your application! =

title: Real Estate Acquisitions VA
description:
Real Estate Acquisitions Specialist (Remote)



About Us

Price Real Estate Investments is a multi-market U.S. based real estate investment company focused on acquiring off-market properties directly from homeowners. We specialize in building strong relationships with sellers, negotiating with them, and closing deals virtually. Our team is fully remote, but our impact is nationwide — and we’re growing quickly.



We’re looking for an experienced Real Estate Acquisitions Specialist to join our acquisitions team. This role is critical to our business: you’ll be speaking directly with homeowners, negotiating terms, and guiding sellers through the contract signing process. If you’ve personally made offers to sellers and closed contracts over the phone, this is an opportunity to put your skills to work in a high-energy, professional environment.



Compensation

$10/hour USD base pay



Plus Monthly Contract Bonuses for getting offers accepted:

• Bronze: 2 signed contracts = $500 bonus

• Silver: 3 signed contracts = $1,000 bonus

• Gold: 4 signed contracts = $1,500 bonus

• Platinum: 5+ signed contracts = $2,000 bonus



On-target earnings can range from $2,500–$3,500+ per month depending on performance. Pay dates are on the 1st and 15th of each month.



We believe in rewarding results. Our top performers earn meaningful bonuses based on closed contracts and consistent production.



Schedule

Full-time, Monday to Friday

9:00 AM – 6:00 PM CST

Remote position, work from your own secure setup



What You’ll Be Doing

- Engage with homeowners (seller leads), build authentic rapport, and manage conversations with professionalism

- Follow a proven acquisitions script while sounding natural and confident

- Ask strong follow-up questions to uncover seller motivation and property condition

- Make verbal offers, negotiate price and terms, and walk sellers through agreements using DocuSign

- Handle objections effectively and push deals forward toward signed contracts

- Maintain organized notes, offers, and seller updates in our CRM

- Collaborate closely with the acquisitions team and leadership



What It Takes to Succeed Here

- Relentless Follow-Up: Sellers don’t always respond the first time — or the second. You know how to stay persistent with calls, texts, and follow-ups until you get an answer. Nothing slips through the cracks on your watch.

- Extreme Attention to Detail: Every call, every note, every update gets logged correctly in the CRM. You don’t miss details, and you take pride in keeping your pipeline organized. If you’ve ever been called meticulous or “on top of everything,” this is where you’ll shine.

- Closer’s Mentality: You’re not just reading a script — you know how to listen, build rapport, and guide sellers toward a decision. You thrive on negotiation, handle objections with confidence, and create win-win agreements that get signed.

- Driven by Results: You measure success by contracts closed. You hold yourself to high standards and push to hit — and exceed — your targets consistently. You’re motivated by performance and driven by the satisfaction of closing successful deals.

- Resilient Problem-Solver: Whether it’s a tough seller, a pricing objection, or a complicated situation, you don’t freeze — you find solutions and move the deal forward. Challenges are part of the role, and you thrive in solving them under pressure.



Requirements

- Minimum 2+ years of experience in real estate acquisitions or seller negotiations

- Proven track record of closing real estate deals and securing signed contracts

- Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)

- Confidence and professionalism on the phone; ability to build trust and rapport quickly

- Familiarity with real estate terms like ARV, repairs, inspection, contingencies, etc.

- Strong work ethic, coachability, and ability to follow scripts while sounding natural

- Proficiency with CRMs and outbound dialers

- Reliable high-speed internet, updated computer, and a quiet workspace



What We’re Looking For

- A confident, friendly, and persuasive communicator who thrives on results

- Someone who is organized, detail-oriented, and relentless in follow-up

- A professional with the drive to close contracts and grow with a fast-moving team



Why Join Us?

- Competitive pay with structured bonuses

- Real opportunities for growth in a professional investment company

- Work remotely with a team that supports your success

- A chance to close real deals, make a real impact, and develop long-term career skills in acquisitions



At Price Real Estate Investments, acquisitions is the heartbeat of our business. You’ll be in the front seat, driving growth and learning the strategies that power real deals across multiple U.S. markets.



How to Apply: (Read Carefully – Incomplete Applications Will Be Ignored)

-
 us at: 

- Subject line: Real Estate Acquisitions Application – OJPH

- Attach your resume with relevant real estate or sales experience

- Include a 1–2 minute audio or video introduction about yourself and experience.



Only applicants who follow all instructions will be considered.

title: Reddit Community & Content Specialist
description:
What you’ll do



Research relevant subreddits (SEO/AEO/GEO, Shopify/ecom, marketing, agencies) + summarize rules/culture



Write and post value-first comments and posts (no spam, no “growth hacks”)



Help build a repeatable weekly cadence + content calendar



Suggest safe ways to reference Meridian when truly relevant



Share a simple weekly report (what you did, what worked, insights)



Requirements



Strong written English + Reddit-native writing style



Experience with community marketing / content / social



Good judgment + respect for subreddit rules/mods



Hiring process



We start with a paid 1-day work trial (prompt + deliverables) before ongoing work.



To apply



Please send:



Examples of Reddit/community work (links or screenshots; anonymized OK)



A 3 minute video note on why you’re a fit, your experience, and your availability for a paid 1-day trial

title: Master YouTube Video Editor
description:
Apply here:


/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeKQA1drsmg5QN5lSvosJvFWpDcgcRjzTXRl9-RCQXOwFoqLQ/viewform?usp=header





LOOKING FOR A YOUTUBE LONG FORM EDITOR (horizontal more than 5 minute edits).  Average about 3-4 a week. (depending on complexity). 



Will you be our next editor? We are Raffiti Media, and we want you to edit for us.



This is the typical editing style we’re looking for:

youtu.be/fkrdUqKkg94?si=yNTvXEyO70eIj1LC



--Employment Expectations for the Editor Position--



Our editors are full-time permanent contractors. If you are offered a contract, you will agree to the following:



** Commitment to a Standard Workweek

A standard 40-hour workweek.



** Remote Office Hours

You are expected to maintain a "remote office hours" schedule, being at your workstation and responsive to messages during standard office hours (08:00 AM - 05:00 PM CST, GMT -6). 



**Deadlines

Meet or beat deadlines given. Generally 24-48 hours for long form videos. Same day for shorts.



** Same-Day Turnaround for Revisions

Handling same-day revision turnaround requests during our regular office hours.



** 30-Day Trial Period

Successfully complete a 30-day trial period by creating and submitting approved longs and shorts.



Post-Trial Period

** Upon successful completion of the trial, you will sign a permanent agreement as a full-time editor.



---

We have a 4 part hiring process.

Step 1: Application.

Step 2 : Working Interview

Step 3: Initial Testing 

Step 4: 30 day trial period.

Step 5: Hire full on or part ways if not a good fit for either party.

----

Who is Raffiti Media?

We are a done-for-you agency that helps businesses start and grow YouTube audiences that bring sales (not just views).

title: STREETWEAR/GRAFFITI/TYPO/WHATEVER WE SAY ARTIST
description:
Senior Multi-Disciplinary Brand & Design Architect



Direct Engagement | High-Discretion Role | Sophisticated Global Brand Environment



Position Overview



We are seeking an exceptionally advanced, culturally fluent, and execution-driven Brand & Design Architect to work directly with us on the ongoing design, evolution, and protection of our brand ecosystem.



This is not a freelance marketplace role and not a single-style designer position. You will operate as a trusted, embedded creative partner, working closely with ownership and leadership across luxury, streetwear, heritage, consumer, digital, and physical brand environments.



This role requires mastery of multiple visual languages, strategic thinking, elite execution, and an uncompromising standard of professionalism, discretion, and reliability.



We determine whether or not your work is on par and could then be published.



?



Nature of Engagement

 • You will work directly with us, not through intermediaries

 • You must be able to align with our working hours, timelines, and pace

 • High availability, responsiveness, and follow-through are expected

 • This role involves access to confidential brand strategy, unreleased designs, and proprietary materials

 • Absolute discretion and confidentiality are mandatory



This position is designed for designers who understand trust, long-term alignment, and high-stakes creative environments.



?



Core Responsibilities

 1. Brand Architecture & Visual Governance

 • Design, evolve, and protect cohesive brand systems across all touchpoints

 • Maintain visual consistency while enabling controlled stylistic range

 • Translate strategic direction into precise, repeatable execution

 2. Multi-Style Design Mastery

 • Confidently design across:

 • Luxury and elevated minimalism

 • Streetwear and cultural counterpoints

 • Heritage and archival-inspired systems

 • Mass-culture consumer branding

 • Experimental and future-forward aesthetics

 • Every stylistic decision must be intentional, justified, and controlled

 3. Product, Apparel & Drop-Based Design

 • Design graphics, typography, layouts, and treatments for apparel and products

 • Support limited drops, campaigns, and long-term collections

 • Design with real-world production, materials, and scalability in mind

 4. Digital & Physical Brand Execution

 • Create assets for websites, apps, social, campaigns, and motion environments

 • Extend brand language into retail, pop-ups, packaging, signage, and physical spaces

 • Ensure digital and physical expressions feel unified and deliberate

 5. Cultural Intelligence & Strategic Relevance

 • Maintain deep awareness of global fashion, art, music, and urban culture

 • Apply trends selectively and strategically, never impulsively

 • Prioritize longevity, credibility, and brand equity over short-term hype

 6. Collaboration & Professional Discipline

 • Work closely with leadership, marketing, production, and strategy teams

 • Present work clearly, confidently, and with rationale

 • Iterate efficiently without sacrificing quality or intent



?



Required Qualifications

 • Proven experience designing across multiple brand tiers and aesthetics

 • Advanced proficiency in professional design tools (Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, etc.)

 • Strong command of typography, layout systems, color theory, and composition

 • Experience delivering both digital and physical outputs

 • Ability to operate independently with minimal oversight

 • Exceptional attention to detail and execution quality

 • Strong communication skills and professional maturity



?



Portfolio Submission Requirements (Mandatory)



Applicants must submit a serious, well-curated portfolio demonstrating:

 • Clear range and versatility across distinct visual styles

 • Strategic thinking, including context and reasoning behind decisions

 • End-to-end execution, from concept through final output

 • Clear indication of your role and ownership in each project



Applications without a strong portfolio will not be considered.



?



Services & Capabilities Expected



You may be required to deliver:

 • Brand identity systems and visual guidelines

 • Apparel and product design assets

 • Campaign and launch visuals

 • Web and app design components

 • Retail and environmental branding

 • Packaging and physical collateral

 • Ongoing creative direction and visual oversight



?



Confidentiality, IP & Professional Standards

 • You must be extremely discreet regarding all work, communications, and materials

 • No work produced for us may be shared, published, reused, or referenced without explicit written permission

 • NDA, IP ownership, and confidentiality agreements will be required prior to engagement

 • This role demands absolute trust, discretion, and professionalism



?



Ideal Candidate



You are disciplined, culturally fluent, and strategically minded.

You understand that great design is not decoration — it is control, intention, and execution.

You are comfortable operating at a high level, under confidentiality, with long-term brand responsibility.



Exact Art & Design Styles Required (Non-Exhaustive)



The designer must demonstrate working mastery of the following specific, recognized art and design styles, with the ability to apply them appropriately across apparel, branding, digital, and physical environments:

 • Swiss / International Typographic Style

Grid-based systems, asymmetric layouts, objective typography, precision hierarchy, and clarity-driven composition.

 • Bauhaus & Modernist Design

Functional minimalism, geometric forms, primary color logic, and design driven by purpose rather than decoration.

 • Postmodern & Deconstructivist Design

Intentional rule-breaking, layered systems, visual tension, expressive typography, and controlled chaos.

 • Brutalist Graphic Design

Raw layouts, stark typography, high contrast, utilitarian structures, and anti-polish aesthetics.

 • Editorial & High-Fashion Art Direction

Magazine-driven composition, art-directed photography, typographic narrative, and visual pacing.

 • Luxury Minimalism

Extreme restraint, typographic refinement, tonal palettes, spacing discipline, and material sensitivity.

 • Streetwear & Underground Graphics

Poster culture, DIY aesthetics, cultural symbolism, stencil logic, graffiti-adjacent systems, and raw graphic expression.

 • Heritage / Archival Revival

Vintage typography, historical print methods, retro layouts, brand archaeology, and legacy reinterpretation.

 • Pop Art & Commercial Iconography

Bold color, repetition, simplified forms, mass-culture visual language, and instant recognizability.

 • Psychedelic & Experimental Graphics

Distorted typography, optical play, organic forms, layered visuals, and sensory-driven composition.

 • Futurist / Neo-Futurist Design

Motion-forward thinking, modular systems, technological aesthetics, and speculative visual language.

 • Minimalist Typography-First Systems

Type-led identity, hierarchy dominance, spacing control, and editorial logic over illustration.

 • Grunge & Raw Texture Design

Distress, imperfection, analog artifacts, and deliberate erosion of polish.

 • Conceptual & Art-Driven Design

Idea-first visuals, symbolism, reduction, and meaning embedded in form.

 • Campaign-Driven Visual Systems

Seasonal narratives, drop-based art direction, evolving visual arcs, and controlled variation.



?



Application Requirement



Applicants must clearly label which of the above styles are represented in their portfolio and demonstrate intentional, professional execution of each. Superficial or trend-based interpretations will not be considered.





PS:



YOU WILL NEED TO SHOW US VARIOUS WORK ALONG WITH VARIOUS STYLES TO THEN REPRESENT THAT WORK

YOU WILL NEED TO HANDLE MULTIPLE TASKS

YOU WILL NEED TO PREPARE THE WORKS YOU DO FOR US IN A WAY THAT IS IN A WAY WITH WHAT WE DO NOW

YOU WILL NEED TO SHOW US MORE THAN SIMPLE WORKS IE CANVA, SKETCHES, BROCHURES, BASIC ADS DO NOT JUST ATTACH THESE



DESIGNS LIKE

SUPREME

PLEASE BE SURE TO INCLUDE SOFTWARES AND OTHER ART PRODUCTS YOU USE IE FIGMA, BLENDER, ADOBE, 

PLEASE BE SURE TO SAY IF YOU DONT DO ANY DIGITAL AND JUST RENDER 

PLEASE BE SURE TO MENTION TO US WHAT IT IS YOU DO 



BE COMFORTABLE WITH ON GOING PROJECTS, REVISIONS, GROUP WORKING, SOLO WORKING, NOTION, GOOGLE DRIVE AND OTHER APPLICATIONS THAT WOULD ALLOW US TO WORK TOGETHER EITHER SOLO OR AS A COLLECTIVE TEAM, WE'VE GOT TEAMS IN ALMOST ALL TIME ZONES SO PLEASE BE AWARE AND RESPECT THAT.



PROJECTS COULD BE A SIMPLE TYPO TO A FULL STORYBOARD, A MINI OUTLINE TO FULL WALL ILLUSTRATIONS



UPON SEEING YOUR WORK BASED ON PROJECTS FULL TIME WILL BE AN OPTION.

title: CRM Administrator
description:
Mia is an AI agent transforming communication at car dealerships by acting as a super-employee — handling phone calls, texts,
s, and more. We bridge the gap between modern customer expectations and dealerships' outdated communication systems. Our mission is to make the car buying and servicing experience frictionless, scalable, and genuinely helpful.





Mia Labs is hiring a CRM Administrator for an initial 6-month independent contractor engagement. You’ll help us clean up CRM data, build reporting and workflows, and improve day-to-day adoption across teams. 



Important: Since we primarily use HubSpot, you must commit to completing designated HubSpot Academy courses and earning certifications during the contract period.



What You’ll Do

CRM Data Cleanup: Cross-reference internal spreadsheets and source systems to validate, standardize, and improve CRM data accuracy, so the CRM becomes the single source of truth.

Lifecycle Visibility: Build clear visibility into the customer lifecycle (e.g., onboarding progress, renewals, cancellations in progress, key stages).

Reporting & Dashboards: Convert existing spreadsheet-based reporting into HubSpot reports/dashboards. Some limited reporting may remain in spreadsheets as needed.

Workflows & Automation: Design and implement workflows to increase efficiency. especially for the Customer Success team.

Customer Health Score: Help develop and maintain a customer health scoring model to proactively identify and manage risk.

Adoption & Enablement: Support documentation, onboarding, and change management to ensure teams consistently use the CRM.

HubSpot Learning (Required): Complete assigned HubSpot Academy coursework and certifications.



Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

2+ years of hands-on CRM administration experience (HubSpot, Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, Zoho, Pipedrive, or similar CRM systems)

Strong CRM data management + reporting skills

Experience maintaining a CRM as a system of record 

Comfortable working with Customer Success, Sales, and Ops

Detail-oriented, organized, and process-driven

Learn HubSpot and complete required HubSpot Academy certifications



Nice to Have

Familiarity with HubSpot, and/or HubSpot Academy certifications

Experience with CRM migrations and/or B2B SaaS data cleanup projects

Strong knowledge on customer lifecycle operations and health scoring



Contract Details

Type: Independent Contractor

Term: 6 months (with potential extension based on performance and business needs)

Schedule: Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM US Central Time (CST/CDT)

Hours: 40 hours/week

Compensation: USD 1,000/month

Payout: Bi-monthly



How to Apply

Please send:

A short intro about your CRM background (which CRMs you’ve used)

A link to your latest resume

A list of CRM-related certifications (if any)

title: Quantity Surveyor / Office Engineer - Remote (Experience in JobTread)
description:
Application instructions below:



About PropFix.ie



PropFix.ie is Ireland's trusted property maintenance specialist, offering comprehensive solutions with years of expertise across the construction and renovation sectors. We transform spaces through our diverse range of services, from handyman solutions and office fit-outs to complete renovations, house extensions, and specialized installations including doors, floors, and partitions.



Our commitment to delivering the best value property maintenance has established us as a reliable partner for residential and commercial clients nationwide. With decades of experience, including 50 years of expertise in garage conversions, we pride ourselves on impeccable craftsmanship, turning our clients' visions into reality while ensuring their properties remain in top condition.



Role Overview

We are seeking a detail-oriented Quantity Surveyor/Office Engineer to join our dynamic team. This multifaceted role combines quantity surveying expertise with office engineering and financial administration, focusing on accurate cost estimation, project budgeting, and comprehensive project support. The successful candidate will work closely with our project managers, site teams, and clients to ensure precise cost control and seamless project delivery from concept to completion.



Key Responsibilities

Cost Estimation & Quantity Surveying



Project Estimating: Calculate materials, labor costs, and overall project budgets with precision

BOQ & BOM Preparation: Develop comprehensive Bills of Quantities and Bills of Materials for all projects

Job Pricing: Analyze construction plans and prepare detailed quantity requirements and pricing structures

Contract Analysis: Scrutinize maintenance costs, material expenses, and contracts to secure optimal deals

Tender Management: Analyze tenders and manage procurement processes for construction and design projects

Prepare accurate brickwork and blockwork quantity take-offs, including bricks, blocks, mortar, lintels, insulation, and related masonry components

Analyze brickwork labor and material rates to ensure competitive and accurate pricing

Estimating Tools: Utilize software including Simpro, JobTread, Bluebeam, PlanSwift, CostX, Measure Square, Stone Pro, and Microsoft Office to support estimating, budgeting, and project documentation.



Project Coordination & Client Management



Stakeholder Liaison: Coordinate with site managers, clients, contractors, and subcontractors to ensure smooth project execution

Reporting: Prepare comprehensive reports, analyses, contracts, budgets, and risk assessments

Strategic Advisory: Advise managers and clients on cost improvements, new strategies, and savings opportunities

Change Management: Document design changes and update budgets accordingly

Material Management: Track materials inventory and coordinate ordering when required



Financial Administration & Office Support



Invoice Management: Handle invoicing processes and perform data entry for financial documentation

Administrative Support: Assist staff accountants and handle various office and financial tasks

Client Administration: Manage administrative tasks delegated by clients with efficiency and accuracy



Required Skills & Experience

Technical Requirements



Quantity Surveying: Proven experience in cost estimation, BOQ preparation, and quantity surveying methodologies

Construction Knowledge: Strong understanding of construction processes, materials, and industry standards

Financial Acumen: Experience with budget management, financial reporting, and cost control

Contract Management: Knowledge of construction contracts, procurement, and tender analysis

Simpro Experience: Hands-on experience using Simpro for job costing, project budgeting, invoicing, and workflow management



Professional Skills



Analytical Skills: Strong problem-solving abilities with exceptional attention to detail

Software Proficiency: Competency in quantity surveying software, spreadsheet applications, and financial systems

Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills for client and contractor liaison

Organization: Outstanding organizational skills with ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

Adaptability: Flexibility to handle diverse administrative and technical tasks



What We Offer



Competitive salary package

Opportunity to work with self-builders across Ireland and the UK

Professional development and training opportunities

Collaborative and supportive remote work environment

Career growth potential within an expanding company

Involvement in diverse construction and visualization projects

Remote working flexibility with comprehensive project support systems

Experience working on international projects with diverse clients.



Instructions:

Please complete the attached application form and submit it along with your CV:

title: Telemarketer
description: I am an insurance agent for Farmers Insurance and I am looking for someone to make cold calls (leads provided) and schedule appointments for my agents to quote. I am seeking someone motivated and who is willing to make at least 150 calls per day and schedule a minimum of 10 appointments a day. You will be trained extensively on what to say and and how to use our customer management system. We have meetings twice a week to make sure everyones on track and there aren't any issues with the calls or script. The salary is $600/mo with a $5 bonus for every policy we sell. I would anticipate each month if all goes to plan there will be at least 20-40 policies being sold per month on our end at 10 appointments a day. I am a great boss I want to make sure whoever works for me has enough money to feed their family with one job and not have to work multiple jobs.

title: Marketing & Advertising Specialist (B2B / IT)
description:
We are a fast-growing U.S.-based IT Solutions company seeking a Marketing & Advertising Specialist to strengthen B2B market positioning and actively support pipeline growth through consistent, measurable marketing initiatives.



This role exists to ensure marketing efforts are closely aligned with sales objectives and pipeline stages, not limited to content creation or surface-level engagement. You will work cross-functionally with sales and design teams to drive lead quality, campaign performance, and predictable contribution to revenue growth.



This is a hands-on role for someone who understands how B2B marketing supports demand generation, lead qualification, and pipeline progression in an IT / services environment.



Core Responsibilities

B2B Marketing & Advertising Execution

• Plan, execute, and continuously optimize B2B marketing campaigns (paid and organic) to support pipeline growth.

• Strengthen DRI’s B2B positioning through consistent messaging, campaign alignment, and audience targeting.

• Prioritize lead quality over lead volume, focusing on relevance, intent, and sales readiness.

• Ensure marketing initiatives align with pipeline stages (MQL / SQL) and sales workflows.



Campaign & Performance Management

• Monitor campaign performance and make data-driven optimizations based on results.

• Track and report on non-vanity metrics that demonstrate contribution to pipeline health.

• Maintain campaign structure, attribution, and tracking discipline across platforms.



Content & Messaging Consistency

• Ensure consistent content output in terms of cadence, messaging, and relevance to target B2B audiences.

• Coordinate content efforts across channels to support lead nurturing and pipeline progression.

• Translate technical IT services into clear, sales-aligned marketing messaging.



Sales & Design Collaboration

• Work closely with sales to support lead qualification, pipeline progression, and opportunity development.

• Provide marketing support for proposals, sales decks, and client-facing materials.

• Collaborate with the design team to ensure marketing assets are visually aligned, clear, and effective.



Tools & Platforms

Experience with or working knowledge of the following is expected:

• LinkedIn Campaign Manager

• Google Analytics 4 (GA4)

• Google Tag Manager (GTM)

• Google Search Console

• Looker Studio (or equivalent reporting tools)

• CRM discipline (lead stages, UTMs, attribution, pipeline tracking)

• Basic marketing automation tools such as Zapier, Make, or n8n (nice to have)



Scope & Expectations

• This is a hands-on role focused on execution, optimization, and measurement.

• Not a strategy-only, branding-only, or community-only position.

• Marketing is expected to directly support revenue growth and pipeline health.

• Success in this role is measured by impact, not activity.



Performance Evaluation Criteria

• Campaign performance and ongoing optimization.

• Lead quality and contribution to a healthy, progressing sales pipeline.

• Engagement across priority B2B channels (measured through non-vanity metrics).

• Consistency and reliability of content delivery.

• Effectiveness of collaboration with sales and design teams.



Qualifications

• Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Advertising, Communications, or a related field.

• Minimum 3 years of experience in B2B marketing or advertising roles.

• English proficiency at C1 level or higher (required)

• Experience with B2B, IT, SaaS, or technology-driven companies is highly valued.

• Strong analytical mindset with the ability to connect marketing activity to pipeline outcomes.

• Comfortable working in a structured, remote environment with clear accountability.



What We Offer

• Weekly pay of USD $200

• Permanent remote position

• Fixed weekends off

• Direct collaboration with a U.S.-based and international team

• A results-driven environment with long-term growth opportunities



How to Apply

Apply through this platform with the subject line: "Marketing & Advertising Specialist”

Start your message with: “Blue Mockingbird”



Please include: 

• Resume/CV

• Portfolio or relevant marketing & advertising samples

• WhatsApp contact number

• References

• A short video introduction explaining why you are a strong fit for this role



Important: We receive a high volume of applications. Only candidates who follow the application instructions below will be considered.

title: Personal Brand Content + Personal Assistant
description:
???? Personal Brand Content & Growth Manager (Instagram & TikTok)



We are looking for a creative, trend-aware Social Media Manager to help grow a personal brand on Instagram and TikTok.



This role is not just about posting — it’s about creating viral-style short content, managing clip pages, and constantly generating new content ideas.



???? Main Mission



Turn raw content and daily activities into high-performing short-form videos while also expanding reach through additional clip-style accounts and proactive content ideation.



???? Core Responsibilities

1?? Personal Account Growth



• Manage the main personal Instagram and TikTok accounts

• Edit and publish Reels and TikToks from provided footage

• Create strong hooks in the first 1–3 seconds

• Add captions, subtitles, dynamic cuts, zooms, and sound effects

• Use trending sounds and native platform styles

• Optimize videos for retention and engagement



2?? Clip / “Spam” Account Strategy



• Create and manage secondary “clip” accounts that repost short highlights

• Repurpose main content into multiple short clips

• Post frequently to maximize reach and visibility

• Test different hooks, captions, and formats on these accounts

• Use these accounts to drive traffic back to the main personal brand



3?? Content Ideation



• Suggest new video ideas every week based on trends and performance

• Propose hooks, formats, and talking points to record

• Identify viral trends that can be adapted to the personal brand

• Help plan what content should be filmed next

• Actively think about “what can blow up” rather than just editing



???? Content Style We Want



• Short, dynamic, high-retention videos

• Strong hooks that stop the scroll

• Business, mindset, success, or lifestyle insights

• Native-looking content (not polished ads)

• Designed to reach non-followers



???? Skills Required



• Deep understanding of Reels & TikTok growth mechanics

• Skilled in short-form video editing (CapCut, Premiere, etc.)

• Knows how to structure videos for watch time and retention

• Creative mindset with strong idea generation

• Up to date with trends and viral formats



???? Ideal Profile



• Thinks like a content creator, not just an editor

• Obsessed with growth and reach

• Fast executor

• Autonomous and proactive

• Comfortable managing multiple accounts



???? Goal of the Role



Grow the personal brand by turning everyday content into viral-style videos, expanding reach through clip accounts, and continuously feeding new content ideas to record.

title: Customer Service Agent
description:

title: CRO Manager for Fast Growing E-Commerce Brand
description:

---

CRO / Funnel Architect Wanted — Help Us Reach $100M/Year

- We’re scaling a high-performance men’s DTC brand on a clear path to $100M+ revenue — and we’re looking for a CRO Manager to own and orchestrate the entire on-site conversion layer for US traffic.

- You are not a “page optimizer.” You are a rare blend of funnel architect, offer strategist, direct-response copywriter, and conversion scientist — someone who doesn’t guess, doesn’t rely on luck, and doesn’t tolerate weak execution. You think in funnels, psychology, experiments, and revenue metrics.

- You ensure every marketing launch, funnel, offer, and campaign lands on a site that converts — with zero friction, zero confusion, and zero execution gaps. You are the bridge between Marketing (Ads, Creative, Offers) and Revenue (Conversion, AOV, MER).

- You love e-commerce. You obsess over numbers. You treat CRO like a scientific discipline — not “vibes.” You are extremely detail-oriented, operationally excellent, and capable of building and enforcing world-class CRO systems. From funnel QA, copywriting, offer architecture, and launch readiness to structured CRO testing and iterative optimization, you operate with precision, speed, and full ownership.

- Own the US Funnel End-to-End — All landing pages, PDPs, advertorials, collections, upsells, and checkout flows. Ensure launch readiness, message match, and flawless execution for every marketing campaign.

- Hands-On Execution & QA — Make small on-site changes yourself or coordinate dev/design resources. Lead QA for copy, offers, pricing, UX, mobile behavior, and page speed to ensure zero friction and zero bugs.

- Systematic, Owner-Mindset Approach — Structure experiments, document workflows, and build repeatable CRO processes. Think of revenue impact, not tasks.

---

Who We’re Looking For

- Full-funnel CRO expertise — landing pages, PDPs, funnels, advertorials, checkout flows, and upsells

- Offer & pricing strategy mastery — bundles, upsells, pricing psychology, and anchoring

- Direct-response copywriting — persuasive, conversion-driven copy aligned with ads

- Performance-driven mindset — CVR, AOV, MER focused, with structured, data-backed decision-making

- Hands-on and detail-obsessed — ability to execute changes, QA thoroughly, and maintain clean, scalable funnels

- US DTC experience — understanding of US audience behavior and conversion expectations

- Collaboration & ownership — communicate clearly, work with cross-functional teams, take full accountability for results

- You’re fluent in English – You communicate clearly, explain your strategy, and collaborate seamlessly with creative, media, and engineering teams.

---

What We Offer

- Work remotely & flexibly – We care about results, not where you are.

title: Junior Media Buyer / Meta Ads Assistant for Fast Growing E-Commerce Brand
description:

nts into engaging content

if this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Shopify Web Developer - CRO Specialist - Ecommerce Advertising Agency - Full Time 1a
description:
APPLY ON MY WEBSITE TO BE CONSIDERED: 


/cro-shopify-web-developer/



CRO Shopify Web Developer – Job Overview

I am looking for an experienced shopify web developer to help me upgrade client’s checkout processes and execute CRO tests for various ecommerce brands.

In this role you will update Shopify theme templates, develop landing pages using various page builders and html/CSS frameworks, research/install various checkout/bundle applications, and implement A/B tests using testing tools like intelligems.

You will also report on test performance, and provide suggestions for next steps.

This is a full-time opportunity. Training will be provided and you will work directly with me.



About Zack Miller

My name is Zack Miller, and I’ve been a DTC Ecommerce Growth Marketer since 2019. I’ve done everything fro
dia buying and client strategy, to agency internal operations.

I’ve contributed to the growth of over 200 ecommerce brands in my agency experience. Now, as an independent growth marketing partner, I work closely with a small number of brands on their new customer acquisition strategy.



Note: All Remote Employees Must Be Available To Work During The Following Business Hours:

Monday: 9am – 5:30pm EST

Tuesday: 9am – 5:30pm EST

Wednesday: 9am – 5:30pm EST

Thursday: 9am – 5:30pm EST

Friday: 9am – 5:30pm EST



Roles & Responsibilities

- Develop landing pages using Figma and various WYSYWIG editors including but not limited to Replo and Pagefly.

- Edit product, collection and other page templates using Shopify Liquid template engine, and various HTML/CSS frameworks.

- Install various checkout/tracking applications (aftersell, Zipify OCU, Upstack, etc)

- Install various applications for product bundling when needed, and create product bundles. 

- Install tracking pixels on client’s websites

- Implement A/B tests in intelligems for product price tests, shipping price tests, theme tests, landing page tests, and more. 

- Research new ideas for direct response content marketing strategies.

- Work in my project management system, ClickUp.

- Apply a process-first mentality and provide feedback to help further develop our operating systems.



Required Experience & Education

- Strong verbal and written English language skills (American Dialect)

- Strong knowledge of HTML/CSS/Javascript/Shopify Liquid required. 

- Knowledge of Python and Ruby preferred but not required.

- 1+ years of web development (Shopify) experience required

- 1+ years of backend python (flask/django) development experience preferred but not required

- 1+ years of marketing agency experience preferred but not required

- Must be highly organized and possess strong attention to detail

- All applicants are encouraged to apply, regardless of experience or education



APPLY ON MY WEBSITE TO BE CONSIDERED: 


/cro-shopify-web-developer/a

Collaborate closely with our regional teams to grow an exciting portfolio of leading Korean brands, including Beauty of Joseon, Needly, Tirtir, and other top-trending names in the market.

mber who can independently oversee e-commerce operations, take proactive initiative, and consistently deliver results with minimal supervision, ensuring long-term success and stability in the role.

- Highly organized, able to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Benefits:

Additionally, the candidate should possess strong analytical skills to interpret data and identify algorithm trends, along with reliable high-speed internet access to support remote work.



How to Apply: Please respond and use "WARRIOR" as a subject line, making sure you read the listing. Also, include your TEAMS ID along with your resume link or portfolio; those without the subject line will not be entertained.

title: Administrative Assistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organized, proactive, and results-oriented Administrative Assistant to provide comprehensive support to our team.



The ideal candidate should have at least 3 years of experience as an administrative assistant, with strong proficiency in Google Workspace, ClickUp, and Slack. We are looking for someone who is not only comfortable handling phone and video calls but who can take ownership of tasks, streamline processes, and ensure projects are completed efficiently. This role requires a self-starter who can prioritize tasks effectively, proactively solve problems, and handle sensitive information with discretion.



Candidates must have relevant experience and must complete the initial screening form, available here: 
 , to be considered.



Responsibilities:



Take ownership of assigned tasks and projects, seeing them through to completion with minimal oversight.

Actively manage complex schedules, including arranging meetings, appointments, and travel with an eye on efficiency and priority alignment.

Coordinate cross-functional projects, ensuring deadlines are met and keeping tea
mbers accountable for their deliverables.

Proactively identify and implement process improvements to optimize workflows and increase team productivity.

Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders, ensuring that all tasks are aligned with team goals and delivered on time.

Conduct research, compile data, and prepare actionable reports or presentations that add value and drive informed decision-making.

Use Google Workspace, ClickUp, and Slack to keep projects and tasks organized, updated, and progressing smoothly.

Maintain confidentiality and discretion in handling sensitive information.

Requirements:



Minimum of 3 years of proven experience as an administrative assistant or in a similar role.

Proficiency in Google Workspace, ClickUp, and Slack.

Exceptional organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to independently prioritize tasks.

Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with a professional and proactive demeanor.

Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality and discretion.

Self-motivated, proactive, and able to adapt to changing priorities with ease.

Bachelor's degree preferred but not required.

We are looking for a dedicated professional who brings organization, efficiency, and a results-driven approach to our team.

title: Operations Manager – Project-Based (Stripe & E-commerce Partner Management)
description:
Wage / Salary:



$400–$600 per project (depending on experience and performance)

Potential performance bonus for high-quality work and efficiency



Desired Hours per Week:



15–25 hours (flexible based on project needs)



Contact Name:



YesLemon (Founder, Revlinker)



?



Job Description:



Revlinker is a fast-growing agency that connects Stripe account owners and other payment processor owners with e-commerce businesses to process sales. We are looking for a highly skilled Operations Manager to manage day-to-day operations and ensure everything runs smoothly between our partners, referrals, and internal team.



Responsibilities:

 • Manage communication with Stripe account owners and e-commerce partners

 • Onboard new Stripe accounts and ensure they are filled with expected sales

 • Monitor and report performance metrics to the founder

 • Handle operational issues according to SOPs (e.g., account bans, payment disputes)

 • Train and supervise freelance tea
mbers on project tasks

Requirements:

title: Instagram Manager
description:
Our world-class based model agency called Luck Management is based in Europe and looking for someone to manage the Instagram content of our models



The main part will basically be tracking content and creating engaging content for our models.



You will be part of an successful team that’s always striving for improvement to make everybody’s dream come true!



More information about the job:



In the starting phase you will get learned into our Instagram System and begin by Tracking the Videos of our models. This will show you the kind of Content we are currently producing + gives you a better understanding of what makes our videos/posts go viral.



After you mastered the skill of tracking those videos, the next step would be finding new viral Instagram Trends/Sounds, that we can use for new Instagram Content.

As soon as you mastered this, we will teach you the way of creating viral content. The end goal is to have you as one of our Instagram Marketing Managers, that knows exactly how to make any client of us, go viral on Instagram :)



-> We teach you every step thats needed, but expect you to already have experience with Instagram and Instagram Content Creation. Before joining our agency you should already know how Instagram works and whats needed to go Viral on the platform.



Please only apply to this position if you have experience with Instagram Marketing!

We will ask for proof of your past work during the application process.



Requirements:



- flawless english skills verbal + written

- experience in the Instagram Marketing field

- a second phone that you can use for Instagram work + good working PC/Laptop

- perfect internet connection 

- open minded and adaptable 

- effective time-management skills



What you can expect:



- very good salary with potential increase after some time (starting with 4$/hour). 

- possibility to level up in the company and increase your salary

- strong support from our managers 

- healthy and supportive work environment and way more!



Schedule:



about 6-8 hours a day - 6-7days a week. We probably start with less hours and increase them by time



Contact:



Important!! -> The first message of your text should be „Viral Instagram“ and after that you should follow with your name, introduction etc. - as we are getting lots of messages on Telegram and need to categorise it



Please make sure to really add proof of your past projects/experience, beside your introduction



If you take this application very seriously - it will change your life for the better - guaranteed - but you have to take it brutally seriously. 



So if you think you are a great a fit for our company, please 
 via Telegram with all the mentioned information above. We are looking forward to welcome you in our team with pleasure



*Calls get blocked*



Good Luck! :)

title: Social Media Manager
description:
JOB OVERVIEW



We are looking for a visually-driven, trend-savvy Social Media Manager to bring the magic of Berlin to life on screen. 



While our writers handle the deep dives, you will create visual content for Berlin Bound across Instagram,
, and Pinterest.



Your goal is to stop the scroll and get our ideal audience members (Americans traveling to Berlin, Germany) to engage, opt-in, and head to our website. 



We want someone who understands that a 7-second reel of a rainy U-Bahn station can sometimes tell a better story than a 2,000-word essay.



You’ll be responsible for creative engaging travel guides via shareable social media posts like Instagram carousels and posts in
 Groups. 



This is a part-time, fully remote position with minimal meetings.



We don't want fully A.I. generated content, either; we want a truly creative strategist who understands how to build a digital neighborhood.



As a social media manager myself, I can teach you what you need to know if you're not comfortable with one of these platforms, but I'm really looking for someone who is (or can become) better than I am.





KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Content Creation: Design and edit engaging Reels, text posts, and Carousel posts. You’ll use a mix of user-generated content (UGC), footage and photos provided my me, as well as assets provided by our team. 



Platform Management: Manage daily postings and community engagement on Instagram,
, and Pinterest.



Community Engagement: Spend time each day responding to comments and DMs, and engaging with other travel creators to put Berlin Bound on the map. You'll also engage in other
 Groups about Berlin and Germany on the brand's behalf - authentically helping others and building a name for our brand.



Trend Spotting: Stay on top of trending audios and formats in the travel niche and adapt them to "Berlin style" quickly.



Content Repurposing: Take our long-form blog posts (e.g., "The Best Spätis in Neukölln") and distill them into high-value social tips or aesthetic "saveable" posts.



Pinterest Growth: Use tools like Tailwind to pin our blog imagery and drive consistent traffic back to the website.





SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS



Visual Eye: You have a "vibe" for aesthetics. You know what makes a photo look editorial and what makes a video feel authentic.



Social Native: You live and breathe Instagram, Pinterest, and/or
. You understand how algorithms work, but you prioritize human connection over hacks.



Short-Form Video Editing: Experience with CapCut, InShot, or Canva to create snappy, high-quality video content.



Copywriting: Ability to write catchy captions that encourage saves and shares.



Self-Starter: You can look at a blog post about "The Reichstag" and independently come up with 3 different ways to promote it on social media.



Organization: You’re comfortable using a content calendar (like Notion or Trello) to keep posts organized and on schedule.





PAY & BENEFITS



Pay: $5 USD hourly.



Schedule: Flexible. At first, expect 2-3 hours per week, with more hours available as our social presence grows.



Thirteenth Month Pay: Included!



Birthday Bonus: Bonus equal to 8 hours of work (after 90 days).



Health Insurance Reimbursement: $50 USD per month to contribute towards a monthly healthcare plan from companies like Maxicare or PhilHealth. Must be on the team for at least 90 days to qualify..



Launch Revenue Share: We share our wins! You'll receive bonuses based on the success of our launches.



Holidays Off: We respect your time. Offices close for major holidays in the United States and in the Phillipines.





HOW TO APPLY



To show us your attention to detail and your creative "spark," please follow these steps:



Subject Line: Change the subject to: "Berlin is Trending – [Your Name]"



The "Berlin" Test: Search Berlin, and find something that you think would be of interest to tourists. Try to go a bit "off the beaten path;" don't just pick the most popular places. Tell us one specific "vibe" or "aesthetic" about Berlin you’d love to capture in a Reel (e.g., the techno scene, the cozy cafes, the gritty street art). Explain the post you'd create and if you'd like, share a graphic or mockup (you can add your watermark to it to protect your work; we won't steal from you).



Portfolio: Attach a link to a social media account you’ve managed or a portfolio showing Reels/graphics you’ve created.



The Tool: Tell us your favorite tool for video editing or social scheduling and why you prefer it.

title: Sales Account Executive (Remote - Full Time)
description:

CallHero is a high-growth SaaS company providing AI-powered communication tools for healthcare professionals. Our all-in-one platform helps physical therapists, chiropractors, dentists, and clinic staff improve front desk phone performance and increase patient bookings. title: HTML & Coding Specialist - Short-Term Course Content Project
description:
College professor in California (Silicon Valley area) needs a skilled coder to help organize, convert, and clean up a large batch of exported course files (HTML, XML, Markdown). This is hands-on file work, not design work.



WHAT YOU'LL DO



- Organize and rename a large number of HTML files

- Convert discussion/assignment files from XML to clean HTML

- Edit HTML files in VS Code or similar editor

- Light scripting to batch-process and format files (Python a plus, not required)

- Track everything in spreadsheets

- General file management - fast, accurate, organized



You'll be working with exported Canvas LMS content. If you've worked with Canvas before, that's a huge bonus, but not required. What matters is that you're fast and fluent with HTML and comfortable wrangling lots of files.



REQUIREMENTS



Must have:

- Strong HTML skills - you can read, write, and edit HTML confidently and quickly

- Text editor fluency - VS Code, Sublime, or similar (not Notepad)

- Excellent file management habits - naming conventions, folder structure, attention to detail

- Solid English - written communication needs to be clear

- Fast, reliable internet



Nice to have:

- Python (even basic scripting)

- Experience with Canvas LMS or any LMS

- Markdown familiarity

- Google Sheets skills

- XML experience



WHAT THIS ISN'T



- This is NOT a web design or graphic design gig

- You do NOT need AI experience - I handle that side

- This is NOT an ongoing full-time position - it's a short-term project with potential for more work down the road



PRACTICAL DETAILS



- Start: Immediately, with a small paid test project to confirm fit

- Schedule: Flexible, some overlap with California evening hours (your morning) preferred

- Duration: Short-term engagement - think weeks, not months

- Remote access: You'll use AnyDesk for some tasks on my Mac



TO APPLY



Tell me:

1. Your HTML experience - how long, what kind of projects

2. What text editor you use daily

3. Any experience with Python, XML, or Canvas LMS

4. Your availability and rate



Keep it short. If you can do the work, that'll be obvious.

title: Digital Solutions Appointment Setter
description:
Are you tired of campaign-based work that ends every few months or maybe after 1 year?

•Would you like to work at a company with advancement opportunities where you can spend your whole career?

•Do you want to work at a supportive company with a friendly, family culture?

•Do you want to be able to work overtime (but not have it required)?

•Do you want to work for a company where Filipinos are not considered to be outsiders?

•Do you want to work somewhere with no danger they ever ask you to work in person?



Then this is your opportunity.



We build beautiful websites for small businesses across the United States and Canada. Our amazing team of 110 associates has produced incredible results:



We have grown 30%+ each year for the last 8 years.



We have over 2,000 5-star reviews.



100% of our managers and team leads started in entry-level positions with our company.



APPLY HERE: Upgrade to see actual info/f9aaPs/kd86oiarhx/index

You will make outbound calls to small business owners using a dialing platform.

You will offer our website services to potential clients.

You may answer inbound calls from potential clients, scheduling them for appointments to speak to a web designer.



What we offer:

Base pay Php 6,350 per week plus night differential (=Php 7,000/wk.)

Weekly incentive pay

Monthly attendance bonus

Monthly technology allowance

Pay is received every Friday

Very stable work

Permanent position (not just a contract)

Overtime is always available (but not required)

Ability to work from home

Respectful, encouraging work culture

Opportunity to grow with the company



APPLY HERE: 



We are looking for friendly, professional people with strong English language skills to join our team. We are looking for:

Excellent English language skills, both verbal and written

Experience with appointment setting OR equivalent outbound calling experience

Ability to work from home (Must have good internet access, a computer, and a headset.)

A history of great teamwork

Strong customer-handling skills

Able to work during USA business hours from 7:45 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time with overtime (7:45 p.m. to 4 a.m. Manila Time) Monday through Friday, along with an optional OT that runs through 5:00 a.m. Eastern Standard Time.



This is a permanent work-from-home position. Our workflow is extremely stable.



We are a Christian-led business. You will hear a lot about our faith when you work here. We have adopted 8 orphanages in the Philippines with 164 orphans. None of these kids has a birthday that someone on our staff isn't there to celebrate. We reimburse Financial Peace classes, and some employees meet for a Bible study on the clock. You won't have to participate in any of this, but you can. You don't have to be a Christian to work here.



APPLY HERE:
